channel.title: What items did you scam?
channel.description:
Ahhhh the good old day back in 05, back then to make my money all i would do is scam (since ppl in rs are dumb)
My first big scam was scamming a santa hat, then full rune. (Back then full rune was alot) I also remember the third biggest thing i scammed was Fully Addy (g)
Trust game: Items iv gotten from scamming people with the trust game: Pumpkin Rune (g) platebody over 60m cash and finally a Disk of Returning.
Later in the years my account got perminantly banned... :( It wasn't all for scamming, most of it was for password scamming :'( but my account is now unbanned some how (even though it said perm.) but had nothing in the bank but holiday items :((( (non tradeable)
So, post all the items you scammed including trust game, i wanna see what you guys have gotten! : D

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

My maximum losses in the trust game, Full bronze XD
The guy was a level 39 scamming people off their stoof… I had him on my friends list and begged him for my items every day. Finally, he pmed me saying he was quitting and gave me full Mithril.
I was level 69 with full rune by then…

Read full topic

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Stupit:

I got scammed out of full rune with the trust game so then I was pissed off and did my own trust game and got like 2M cash and a couple sets of rune. I was pumped.

I got cabbage, 50+ air runes, and a addy hatchet from a trust game :/. I always got the noobs

Read full topic

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:15, topic:379706”]A few years back, I thought I was going to die because of a scam.

I tried buying a rune hatchet, and got an addy one (lost 10k).

Yeah, this was within a week of the first time I played RS. I was devastated xD[/quote]
I used to do that, too bad the ! exclamation marks are on now

Read full topic

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Uncalled:

The only thing I’ve ever scammed was 15M cash, but scamming is coming back!

Good luck.
I’m guessing they’ll leave the “Recommended wealth transfer” or whatever you want to call it (meaning, it will display the wealth transfer average; but you have the freedom to go whichever way you like).
Also, there’s the (!!!) removal notification in trade.

Read full topic

@chassy13 wrote:

Back when I used to account share my friend fell to the old Leaf-Bladed spear for Guthan Warspear trick :P.

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I call BS at the original post… looks like another person just trying to impress the community with some lies.

OT - I’ve never scammed, but I was scammed (in a way) when I first became a member by buying a ton of an item that way drastically falling in price because he lied and said they were going up.

Read full topic

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

I use to pretend that I was selling some rune scimitars, then when I got a trade offer I would put the rune scimitar in the trade box, then they would put the 24k in the trade box, then right before he/she would accept I would withdraw the rune scimitar and replace it with an iron one.
My brother taught me that.

Read full topic

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @whip_of_soulz whip of soulz
item.description:
@whip_of_soulz wrote:

I used to sell Spinach rolls 100k-1m as “rare” items

Read full topic

item.title: What items did you scam?
item.dc:creator: @anezscape anezscape
item.description:
@anezscape wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:379710"][quote author=anezscape link=topic=475548.msg3477416#msg3477416 date=1295814260]

Stop trolling

umm who?
[/quote]

You, and in 05 full rune was worth about 200k at max.[/quote]

I don’t get how i am trolling, but mabey 200k to me back tthen was a lot… : P
it had to be a lot to everyone at some point on their rs acc

Read full topic

He was at the other side claiming that he is buying for a high price and i’m selling.

Ahhhh the good old day back in 05, back then to make my money all i would do is scam (since ppl in rs are dumb)

My first big scam was scamming a santa hat, then full rune. (Back then full rune was alot) I also remember the third biggest thing i scammed was Fully Addy (g)
